origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_social_security_reductions', 'description': 'This function provides information on social security reductions based on the policy type, reduction type, and age of the applicant.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of social security policy, e.g., health, unemployment.'}, {'name': 'reductionType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of reduction, e.g., tax, contribution.'}, {'name': 'age', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the person applying for the policy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reductionDetails', 'description': 'The details of the social security reduction.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_social_security_reductions, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'social_security', 'reductionType'是'unemployment', 'age'是'24'.

prediction:
想法：获取社会保障减少信息。
动作：InsuranceAPI.get_social_security_reductions。
动作参数：{'policyType': 'social_security', 'reductionType': 'unemployment', 'age': '24'}。
